inclusion.criterion: Primary complaint of neck pain with duration of symptoms greater than 4 weeks
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: They will be issued an informed consent detailing the study and will have time to decide whether or not to participate.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Once they have enlisted in the study they will complete forms to assess their current functional level.
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient has a history of severe 'exploding' headache and was diagnosed with an AVM. She refused PT evaluation but was ambulating independently without difficulty.
